attributes.action: Ask any Intergalactic Philanthropist to lend the Earth PLC (Under New Management) a few quid till we win the galatic lottery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Human race on earth is bankrupt regarding the resource available, and that which we require to continue existence. Having now proven ourself unable to manage with 'just the one planet', our only hope is some intergalactic philanthropist to give/lend us another one. All we need is the PM to ask them for assistance on YouTube...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
